OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD INDEX OF CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES

Desc.entry: Compiles the statutory child disability register for Sheffield. The Sheffield INDEX is part of the Children's Hospital and is run by Health Education and Social Care Services. All children and young people aged 0-19 years who have any disability, special need or long term medical condition are encouraged to register. Information from the Sheffield INDEX is used for future service planning for children with disabilities. Everyone on the register receives a copy of the newsletter "What's Going On". Self or any referral.
